query: query MoviesInCinemaWithFeaturing($cinemaOffset: Int!, $cinemaLimit: Int!, $regionId: Int!, $platform: FeaturingPlatform!) { moviesInCinema(offset: $cinemaOffset, limit: $cinemaLimit, criteria: {regionId: $regionId, fallbackRegionId: 213}) { items { isTicketsAvailableForRegion movie { ...MovieInCinema __typename } __typename } total __typename } featuring { movieInCinemaFeaturing(platform: $platform) { items { __typename movie { ...MovieIsTicketsAvailable ...MovieInCinema __typename } position ... on VideoMovieFeaturingItem { trailerInfo { cast logoImage { avatarsUrl __typename } screenshotImage { avatarsUrl __typename } __typename } trailer { id __typename } __typename } } __typename } __typename } } fragment RatingValue on RatingValue { value isActive count __typename } fragment TicketOptionPurchasable on Movie { ticketOption { purchasable __typename } __typename } fragment MovieInCinema on Movie { id poster { avatarsUrl __typename } title { original russian __typename } ... on Film { productionYear __typename } ... on TvSeries { productionYear __typename } ... on MiniSeries { productionYear __typename } ... on Video { productionYear __typename } ... on TvShow { productionYear __typename } genres { id name slug __typename } rating { kinopoisk { ...RatingValue __typename } __typename } __typename } fragment MovieIsTicketsAvailable on Movie { ...TicketOptionPurchasable __typename }
